function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of small and sans-serif fonts on informal signs","Impact":"Decreased readability and comprehension of signs","Mitigation":"Use of serif, black, and larger fonts to improve readability","Technologies":"Printing technology for producing larger and serif fonts","People":"Consumers, passersby, and customers","Owner":"Retailers and store owners"},{"Description":"Limited color options due to cost and availability of printers","Impact":"Limitation on font color choices for signage","Mitigation":"Investment in color printing technology to increase options","Technologies":"Color printing technology for signage","People":"Retailers and store owners","Owner":"Retailers and store owners"},{"Description":"Miscommunication of professionalism and seriousness due to font choice","Impact":"Miscommunication of retailer's credibility and professionalism","Mitigation":"Use of serif font in black to convey professionalism and seriousness","Technologies":"Printing technology for producing serif fonts in black","People":"Consumers and passersby","Owner":"Retailers and store owners"}]}
